data.value: Check whether the imported data is correct. Uncheck the users you do not wish to be imported. Make sure all fields (First Name, Last Name, Email Address) are filled in for each user. Users with empty fields will not be imported. If the emails of two users coincide, only the first one will be imported. When ready, click Import to finish the importing process.

data.name: ImportContactsEmptyFields

data.name: WelcomeDescription
data.value: Thank you for choosing TeamLab! For the security reasons the password setup procedure must be performed.

data.name: WizardPortalNameDescription
data.value: A name is used to better describe it's purpose and will be visible to all portal users at the log in page and dashboards.

data.name: WelcomeHelper
data.value: The initial settings can be managed here so that you could start work on the portal right away with no additional setup.

data.name: InviteLinkDescription
data.value: This link can be used to invite people to your portal. You can include it to the email and send to the people outside your portal so that they could join it. The link is valid for 3 days.

data.name: HelpQuestionAdvertisementPanelSetting
data.value: What are the advertisement panel settings?

data.name: HelpAnswerAdvertisementPanelSettings
data.value: {1}Advertisement Panel Settings{2} is a way to switch on/off the panels which are used to promote the TeamLab features and get quick access to them.{0}Check the appropriate redio button to switch them on/off. To apply the changes you made use the {1}Save{2} button at the bottom of the section.

data.name: HelpAnswerDNSSettings
data.value: {1}DNS Settings{2} is a way to set an alternative URL for your TeamLab portal.{0}You can either enter a desired alias in the {1}Portal Address{2} field or check the {1}Custom domain name{2} box and specify your own domain name for the TeamLab portal in the field below.{0} To apply the changes you made use the {1}Save{2} button at the bottom of the section.

data.name: MessageReSendInviteInstructionsOnEmail
data.value: Send the email invite instructions to the {0} email address

data.name: PendingDescription
data.value: {!User} had not go by invite link

data.name: ResendInviteDescription
data.value: The invite will be sent to the entered email

data.name: HelpAnswerLngTimeSettings
data.value: {1}Language and Time Zone Settings{2} is a way to change the language of the whole portal for all portal users and to configure the time zone so that all the events of the TeamLab portal will be shown with the correct date and time.{0}Open the corresponding drop-down lists to set the necessary parameters.{0} To apply them use the {1}Save{2} button at the bottom of the section.

data.name: HelpAnswerMailDomainSettings
data.value: {1}Trusted Mail Domain Settings{2} is a way to specify the mail servers that may be used for user self-registering in TeamLab.{0}You can either to check the {1}Custom domains{2} option and enter the trusted mail server in the field below or select the {1}Any domains{2} option.{0}In these cases any member of your company who has an account at specified mail server will be able to register him(her)self by clicking the {1}Join{2} link on the {1}Sign In{2} page and entering an email address with the trusted domain name you add.{0}To disable this option check the corresponding radio button.{0}To apply the changes you made use the {1}Save{2} button at the bottom of the section.

data.name: HelpAnswerPasswordSettings
data.value: {1}Password Strength Settings{2} is a way to determine password strength (the effectiveness of a password in resisting guessing and brute-force attacks).{0}Use the {1}Minimum Password{2} {1}Length{2} bar to determine how long the password should be to be considered strong. Check the appropriate boxes below the bar to determine the character set that must be used in the password.{0} To apply the changes you made use the {1}Save{2} button at the bottom of the section.

data.name: HelpQuestionLngTimeSettings
data.value: What are the language and time zone settings?

data.name: HelpQuestionMailDomainSettings
data.value: What are the trusted mail domain settings?

data.name: HelpQuestionPasswordSettings
data.value: What is the password strength settings?

data.name: HelpAnswerGreetingSettings
data.value: {1}Greeting Settings{2} is a way to change the default portal title and logo to be displayed on the {1}Welcome Page{2} of your portal.{0}Enter the name you like in the {1}Title{2} field. To replace the portal logo click the {1}Change Logo{2} link to the right and select the image stored on your computer to load it to your portal.{0}Please, keep in mind that you can upload an image not larger than {1}250x100 pixels{2}, otherwise resizing will take place. The maximum image size cannot exceed {1}1 MB{2}.

data.name: HelpAnswerSkinSettings
data.value: {1}Skin Settings{2} is a way to customize the portal appearance.{0}Switch between the available skins to select the color scheme which suits you best.{0}To apply the selected skin use the {1}Save{2} button at the bottom of the section.

data.name: HelpAnswerTeamTemplate
data.value: {1}Team Template{2} is a customizable way to name the organization (or group), its members and their activities.{0}Drop down the {1}Template{2} list to choose one of the available presets or enter the names yourselves selecting the {1}Custom{2} option from the list.{0}To apply the selected template use the {1}Save{2} button at the bottom of the section.

data.name: HelpAnswerLinkInviteSettings
data.value: The {0}Invitation Link{1} is used to invite co-workers and friends to join your portal. Copy the link below and paste in to the email to send it to the people you wish to invite. After they follow this link and enter their email, first name, last name and password they will be automatically added to your portal and will be able to start collaborating with you.

data.name: HelpAnswerAccountDeactivation
data.value: If you {1}deactivate{2} your account, your portal and all information associated with it will be blocked so that no one has access to it for a particular period. In this case click the {1}Deactivate{2} button. A link to confirm the operation will be sent to the email address of the portal owner.{0}In case you want to come back to TeamLab portal and resume using it you will need to use the second link provided in the confirmation email. So, please, keep this email in a safe place.{0}If you do not think you will use TeamLab portal and would like to {1}delete{2} your account permanently submit your request using the {1}Delete{2} button. Please, keep in mind that you will not be able to reactivate your account or recover any information associated with it.

data.name: HelpAnswerActivityPortal
data.value: The Recent Activities tab allows you to access the general statistics and check your activities within the {1}Projects{2}, {1}Documents{2} and {1}Community{2} modules.{0}Open the appropriate section clicking it with the mouse to see 10 last actions displayed in the chronological order with the most recent being at the top.

data.name: HelpAnswerAdministrators
data.value: The {1}Administrators{2} tab gives access to the list of portal administrators and the ability to add/remove them.{0}Click the {1}Edit{2} button below the list. In the {1}Select Employees{2} window check the needed people on the list of employees on the left and click the rightwards arrow to add them to the list.{0}To remove employees, check them in the list to the right and click the leftwards arrow.{0}Please, keep in mind that you cannot remove yourself from the list of administrators. If you wish to be excluded, you will have to ask another administrator to remove you.{0}To apply the changes you made use the {1}Save{2} button.

data.name: HelpAnswerCustomizationPortal
HelpAnswerDataBackup
data.value: When your backup is created you can restore it on your local server:{0}1. Log in to your server.{0}2. Follow {1}_ci\deploy\service\{2}{0}3. Double-click the {1}ASC.Data.Backup.Restore.exe{2} file to launch the restore application.{0} 4. In the opened window browse for the backup {1}.bak{2} file you created.{0}5. When ready, click {1}Restore{2}.{0}6. Wait while the application restores the backup.{0}7. Restart the {1}TeamLab{2} Windows service. To do that, go {1}Control Panel{2} >> {1}System and Maintenance{2} >> {1}Administrative Tools{2}, open {1}Services{2}, find {1}theTeamLabPortal{2} service in the list and start it.

data.name: HelpAnswerSocialAccount
data.value: Linking these social accounts with your TeamLab account allows you to access TeamLab portal when you are logged in to these social accounts.{0} To link one of these social accounts with TeamLab, click the {1}Connect{2} link located next to the account you wish to connect and sign in to it.{0}Next time when you log in to the linked account you will be able to access the TeamLab portal just clicking the corresponding icon on the {1}Sign in{2} page.

data.name: HelpAnswerSubscriptionsPortal
data.value: The Subscriptions tab allows you to manage your subscriptions within all the portal modules in one place.{0} To subscribe/unsubscribe from certain notifications click the {1}Subscribe/Unsubscribe{2} link to the right of the needed subscription.{0}To change the subscription type, go to the appropriate subscription, find the {1}Notify{2} by column, click the black arrow next to the default or currently chosen option and select one of the available options: Email, Talk or Email & Talk.

data.name: HelpQuestionAccountDeactivation
data.value: What is the difference between deactivate account and delete account?

data.name: HelpQuestionAdministrators
data.value: How to add/remove a person to/from the administrator list?

data.name: HelpQuestionDataBackup
data.value: How to transfer my portal data to the local server?

data.name: HelpQuestionSocialAccount
data.value: Why would I link these social accounts with my TeamLab account?

data.name: SmsAuthenticationMessageToUser
data.value: Your code to log in to the portal: {0}

data.name: ActivateCodeDescription
data.value: На Ваш мобильный номер {0}{1}{2} выслано SMS-сообщение, содержащее код для доступа на портал.{5}Пожалуйста, введите код и нажмите кнопку "{3}". Если сообщение не приходит более 3-х минут, нажмите на кнопку "{4}".

data.name: ActivateMobilePhoneDescription
data.value: Воспользуйтесь новой возможностью двойной аутентификацией с помощью смс.{0}На Ваш мобильный телефон будет выслано SMS-сообщение, содержащее код для доступа в портал.

data.name: SmsAuthDescription
data.value: This options allows to enable or disable two-factor authentication requiring the SMS one time password method for all users to access the portal

data.name: MobilePhoneChangeDescription
data.value: The instruction to change your mobile number will be sent to your email address

data.name: SendInviteToJoinEmailDesc
data.value: Please enter the email address where the invitation will be sent:

data.name: AdminMessageEmail
data.value: Email address that can be used to contact you

data.name: AdminMessageSent
data.value: Your message was successfully sent. You will be contacted by the portal administrator.

data.name: AdminMessageSettingsDescription
data.value: This setting allows to show or hide the option for the users to contact the portal administrator using the form at the login page.

data.name: AdminMessageTitle
data.value: If you have problems accessing this portal or you need to enter the portal but do not know how to do it, please contact the portal administrator using the form below.

data.name: SendInviteToJoinDescription
data.value: Want to become the portal user?

data.name: InvitePublicSubTitle
data.value: You received the link to this portal from a friend, acquaintance or colleague of yours

data.name: ImportContactsEmptyData
data.value: No contacts has been returned.{0}You also can import contacts from other profiles.

data.name: AccessRightsChangeOwnerConfirmText
data.value: Changes will be applied after the confirmation via Email.

data.name: AccessRightsChangeOwnerText
data.value: To change Portal owner please, choose the Name of the new Portal owner below.

data.name: AccessRightsOwnerOpportunities
data.value: Делать все то же, что и администраторы продуктов|Назначать администраторов продуктов|Управлять доступом к продуктам|Задавать настройки портала|Управлять аккаунтами пользователями|Сменить владельца портала|Удалить портал

data.name: AccessRightsSelectProductModules
data.value: Выберите неодходимые модули {0}, которые будут доступны на портале

data.name: AccessRightsDisabledProduct
data.value: Продукт {0} отключен и не отображается на портале. Для его подключения вопользуйтесь ссылкой справа

data.name: AccessRightsFullAccessOpportunities
data.value: Права такие же как и у Владельца портала, кроме|Сменить владельца портала|Удалить портал

data.value: The user phone will be erased and the instruction to change user mobile number will be sent to email address
